namespacelegend: The namespace will be your identifier for all services that rely on filters, must contain 3-12 characters without spaces
domainlegend: Set a domain to limit which links should be mapped by Hawk
charsetinputlegend: Set in which encoding is the input data
charsetoutputlegend: Set in which encoding the Hawk should store data
protocollegend: Set which protocol should be used by Hawk
filterlegend: Heads up! All filters are literal , the check will be done on a comparative basis if you want to use regular expressions you must enable the feature alongside filter ed , the Hawk uses regular expressions in JavaScript , for more information go to: https://developer.mozilla.org/pt-BR/docs/Web/JavaScript/Guide/Regular_Expressions
urlfilterlegend: The URL filter will limit the mapping by default that are within the filter, eg on the website of The New York Times, map only the news pages of the Americas, the filter is /world/americas/, no link nonstandard this filter will be mapped!
urlprioritylegend: The priority filter defines what links should be processed first , to optimize the desired results it is important to define if the url has standard for such
regex: I want my filter to be recognized as a regular expression
urlignorelegend: The filter bypass defines what links should be ignored during mapping
extractionlegend: Heads up! Extractions define what information should be collected from mapped pages to create extractions filters first load a url in the field below . After loading just move the cursor to the information you want to map , click to the Hawk create the expression , make sure the information was captured correctly. After adding extraction you can set formatting, including conversion tables and lists.
certificatelegend: Select the certificate file for HTTPS connections
namespaceextractionlegend: The namespace defines the registry key that is stored after extraction
newenamespacelegend: The namespace of extraction which defines the recorded reference
newequerylegend: The selector is the code used by Hawk to find the record within the pages , the standard used is the same as CSS if you want to change to optimize the extraction see http://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css_selectors.asp
newetypelegend: The type defines how the information should be treated, if extracted in another format will be converted to standardize data
neweremovehtml: I wish that all HTML will be removed from the result
newerequered: This information must be valid to save the record
currencyl10nlegend: Inform the price format causes information to be stored correctly
newehtmlentities: I want to convert all the characters applicable to html entities
dateformatlegend: Report in which the date and time must be stored format
newelinkremovequery: I want to remove the query link ( everything is after the '?' )
namespacemappinglegend: The namespace defines the reference to be used in the mapper/updater actions and to create routines and alerts
filtermappinglegend: Define which filter is used to perform the mapping/update
norecords: It has found no record of the database!
databaselegend: Set which database will be used to record the data extracted by the mapping/update process
removesearch: Remove parameters after the symbol ? link
requestpersecoundalert: Change per second requests parameter requires prior knowledge of website requests capacity, if it increases beyond the capacity may cause blocking by security systems against DDOS attacks, we recommend that you carried a maximum of 20 requests per second for stability, if you want to perform benchmark tests to find the website requests capacity before being blocked use the Apache Bech tool.
removelinebreakandtabs: I want to remove line breaks(\n) and tabs(\t)
extrationfilterlegend: Defining filters for seed extraction will use the data extraction algorithm pages with the standard
exceptionremovesearchlegend: Parameters removal exceptions prevent remove pagination links for example, so it is highly recommended to check how the website performs paging, if you use GET parameters, report
filtertestinfo: Enter the url of a page that different in that it was made the filter to test the return information, the test will show the results and the wrath page or not be added to the database for lack of some information
urlpatternslegend: The url pattern allows you to set standards for the links that are being extracted avoiding the hawk falling into unnecessary urls that are inside the filter, such as virtual stores enter category filters, to define URL patterns using expressions will be necessary regular, further information visit: https://developer.mozilla.org/pt-BR/docs/Web/JavaScript/Guide/Regular_Expressions
urlpatternsonly: All links should follow the set standards, and any excess of the links should be erased
firstelement: I wish only the first element
maskregexlegend: The mask will filter the desired return, required use of regular expression
sitemaplegend: Enter the website sitemap files to optimize the mapping
